steps.1: add-1/8 cup shredded mozzarella to a bowl
steps.2: add-1/4 tsp salt to a bowl
steps.3: Slice-Slice two 1/2 inch thick rounds from a baguette (slice slanted)
steps.4: Spoon-Spoon the mixture from the bowl onto the bread
steps.5: add-1/4 tsp pepper to a bowl
steps.6: add-1/16 cup basil to a bowl
steps.7: Combine-Combine the contents of the bowl
steps.8: Brush-Brush 2 slices of baguette with olive oil on both sides
steps.9: Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into halves
steps.10: add-In a bowl, add the cut cherry tomatoes
steps.11: Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate
